reviewText: Great western it is very funny and the characters chosen for their roles were just right.  I thoroughly enjoyed it as a comedy.

reviewText: We love the story. It is great; however, the DVD does not perform on all players. We were very disappointed when the player would not display the movie because it is an DVD-R player. It has to be played on a DVD-only player. Once we found one it worked in, we were delighted.

reviewerName: O. L. Williamson Jr. "Real DVD Collector"
reviewText: This movie is not readily available and is a good life lesson on what is right in life on many levels.

reviewText: What if you promised to look after your best friend's son, but he has fallen in with the wrong crowd and won't listen to a thing you say? You saw your best friend "settle down" from those wild ways by the love of a good woman. Couldn't that work again? Or can lighting strike the same place twice?!Yes, this sounds like a chic-flic, but the humor that Buddy Epson, Keir Dullea, and Lois Nettleton bring to the screen will almost make you forget its a chic-flic!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Have been looking for a copy of this movie "like forever"  Was so pleased to find it available on Amazon.  Was not sure about buying a dvd-r, but picture quality and sound are very good.  Ebson shows he truly a very good actor. Definitely not the Beverly Hillbillies.
